title: DeerRun Q1 Pro Smart Walking Pad with remote control
text:
Bigger Size. Run more freely.
Free Carbon-neutral Shipping
Carbon-neutral shipping on all orders
Description
Enhance your fitness routine with DeerRun Smart Walking Pad with remote control. Achieve your fitness goals conveniently and track your progress effortlessly. Have a better running experience to get a healthier you.
Features
- Compact Design
- Small Office & Home Friendly
- 136 kg Capacity
- 2-year Warranty
- 60-day Risk Free Trial
- Replaceable Screws and Lubricant
- Remote Control | 1-6 kph
- Weight: 19.5 kg | 113.8cm (Length) x 50.8cm (Width) x 11.4cm (Height)
Shipping & Warranty
Shipping
Free Shipping within United Kingdom and European countries. We will ship to home and office directly via DHL/ FedEx. Orders will generally ship within five business days and in most cases you will receive your order in about one week. For continental USA orders, we will pay to ship your treadmill to you.
Warranty
We make quality products that are designed to last a lifetime. Rest easy, knowing you are protected by our 2-year warranty.
60-Day Risk Free Trial
Try it for 60-days, and if you don’t like it for any reason at all send it back, no questions asked.
Model Name
BA04
Estimated Delivery:
Free Shipping: On all orders
Product warranty: 2 Years
Worry-free Refund: 60 Days
Guaranteed Safe Checkout
Official Cooperative Logistics
DeerRun Products Are Certified with
We take great care to ensure that items are delivered to our customers as quickly as possible. You will receive your order within 7 working days from the date of the order by following the steps below:
Processing（1-2D）
We usually take 1-2 business days to process your order (if all items are available). Note that this does not include holidays and weekends.
Delivery time（1-5D）
1-5 working days
Delivery methods
We use FedEx and UPS for delivery.
Cost
Free Shipping: UK and other European Countries.
If you have any questions, please contact us from here: support@deerruntreadmill.com
At DeerRun, we offer the best products that can withstand the rigors of everyday use. Our products are tested to industry-leading standards.
Our warranty coverage:
The warranty period is within 2 years after receiving DeerRun products.
This warranty includes quality defects found after receiving the product without use.
DeerRun will, at its option, repair or replace defective products.
What our warranty does not cover:
This warranty does not cover damage caused by negligence, abuse, normal wear, and tear or accident, or man-made damage.
At DeerRun, Your Satisfaction Is Of The Utmost Importance To Us.
Our dedicated Quality Control and Quality Assurance teams inspect your items before dispatch. The quality of our products is guaranteed. However, you need to check your order carefully and accurately before purchasing. See information on product detail pages.
We can arrange returns and refunds for you quickly and easily if there is a quality issue with the item you received. We are here to help you! If you have any problems with your order, you can always contact our support team.
DeerRun supports worry-free returns and refunds within 60 working days after receiving the goods.
Contact Us:
Phone:+1 888 589 0777
Email: support@deerruntreadmill.com
Cancel The Order
Dear friends, if the order is canceled before the order is shipped, the canceled order will receive a full refund. For cancellation requests after an order has been shipped, a Return Material Authorization needs to be issued whether or not the customer has received the order.
I Want To Change My Shipping Address
1: Contact online customer service to confirm whether your order has been shipped
2: After the modification is successful, the logistics order number will be updated in the background.
The Item I Received Is Damaged!
The product may be damaged during shipping, and please contact us within 7 days of the delivery date.
Return Process
1. If you purchased the product on the official website, please contact customer service/call the hotline ( support@deerruntreadmill.com/+1 888 589 0777)
2. You must show a receipt or proof of purchase, we will check and contact you.
3. We will generate a return logistics waybill, which will be picked up by the courier company.
4. After the warehouse receives the return inspection confirmation, the refund will be processed within 72 hours.
5. It may take some time for the refund to appear on your account. Processing refunds usually take 3-7 business days.
If you have completed all these steps and have not received your refund, please contact us at support@deerruntreadmill.com.
Delayed or lost refunds (if applicable)
If you haven't received your refund, please double-check your bank account.
After that, get in touch with your credit card company. It may take some time for your refund to appear on your credit card.
After that, contact your bank. Processing refunds usually take 3-7 business days.
If you have completed all these steps and have not received your refund, please contact us at: support@deerruntreadmill.com
DeerRun Q1 Pro Smart Walking Pad with remote control
DeerRun Q1 Pro Smart Walking Pad with remote control
< 45dB
Absolute quiet while walking
200+
Free AI-based online courses for home fitness
100%
Ready to run with installation-free design
''...DeerRun focuses on women’s fitness ...''
''...suitable for use in the office or at home...''
''...more women will enjoy the health...''
''...women’s fitness needs should not be forgotten...''
"...based on the results of survey of female users..."
New experience of working from home - WalkingPad
DeerRun Q1 Pro Smart Walking Pad features a compact, portable body design, allowing you to place the Walkingpad under your desk, allowing you to achieve your daily step goals while working from home.
4.8-inch thickness allows this treadmill to be hidden in tight spaces
The WalkingPad Treadmill is so compact that it can be stored in almost any corner of your home, under the sofa, under the bed and other tight spaces.
Easy To Store, Suitable For All Scenes
Organize content into multiple columns to share useful information to your customers about your products, values...
Under The Bed
Under The Sofa
Under The Locker
With LED display, real-time viewing of sports data
Five-layer Structure, A Snug Fit On The Foot
Shock-absorbing, durable, and anti-static - four layers of careful design will help you regain your motility and engage in mild exercise. With a comfy foot, you'll feel as if you're walking on a plastic track, and your knees will never squeak.
Brushless Motor, Noise Reduction
Brushless motor featuring high horsepower and lower noise, no-load and full-speed operation producing only 65dB, freeing you of any worry about being complained when exercising late at night.
